00046 template <class T, class Y>
00047 class XVSegmentation{
00048 
00049   typedef T PIXELINTYPE;
00050   typedef Y PIXELOUTTYPE;
00051 
00052  protected:
00053   
00054   int             histSize;
00055   int             histArraySize;
00056   u_int *         histogram;
00057   XVLookupTable<T,Y> * lookup;
00058   
00059 public:
00060 
00061   bool (*SEGFUNC) (const Y);
00062 
00063   XVSegmentation() : histSize(0), histArraySize(0), histogram(NULL), lookup(NULL) {}
00064 
00065   virtual ~XVSegmentation();
00066 
00067   virtual void update(const XVImageBase<T> &) = 0;
00068   
00076   virtual void segment(const XVImageBase<T> &, XVImageBase<Y> &);
00077   virtual void findCentroid(const XVImageScalar<Y> &, XVPosition &, 
00078                    int &, bool (*pf) (const Y) = NULL);
00079   virtual XVRectangleBlob & findBoundingBox(const XVImageBase<T> &, 
00080                             XVRectangleBlob &,  
00081                             bool (*pf) (const Y) = NULL);
00082   virtual double percentError(const XVImageBase<T> &,
00083                      bool (*pf) (const Y) = NULL);
00084   virtual void regionGrow(const XVImageScalar<Y> &, vector<XVRectangleBlob> &, 
00085                  bool (*pf) (const Y) = NULL, 
00086                  int padding = DEFAULT_PADDING,
00087                  int maxRegions = MAX_REGIONS,
00088                  float ratio    = M_TO_S_RATIO);
00089 
00090   void setCheck(bool (*pf) (const Y)){ this->SEGFUNC = pf; }
00091 
00092   u_int * getHistogram(){ return histogram; }
00093 };
